mapper.select: SELECT FACILITY_RESERVE_ID , FACILITY_NM , USER_NM , ANIMAL_NM , FACILITY_RESERVE_DT , TO_CHAR(START_TIME + 30/(24*60)*RESERVE_START_TIME , 'hh24:mi') AS START_TIME , TO_CHAR(START_TIME + 30/(24*60)*(RESERVE_END_TIME+1), 'hh24:mi') AS END_TIME FROM (SELECT R.FACILITY_RESERVE_ID , MAX(FACILITY_NM) AS FACILITY_NM , MAX(MEMBER_MEMBERNAME) AS USER_NM , MAX(ANIMAL_NM) AS ANIMAL_NM , MAX(FACILITY_RESERVE_DT) AS FACILITY_RESERVE_DT , MIN(RESERVE_TIME_INTERVAL) AS RESERVE_START_TIME , MAX(RESERVE_TIME_INTERVAL) AS RESERVE_END_TIME , TO_DATE('2019-08-21 10:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS START_TIME FROM FACILITY_RESERVE_TEST R INNER JOIN USER_TEST5 U ON 1=1 AND R.MEMBER_PK = U.MEMBER_PK INNER JOIN FACILITY_RESERVE_DETAIL_TEST D ON 1=1 AND R.FACILITY_RESERVE_ID = D.FACILITY_RESERVE_ID INNER JOIN ANIMAL_TEST A ON 1=1 AND R.ANIMAL_PK = A.ANIMAL_PK WHERE 1=1 AND D.FACILITY_RESERVE_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY R.FACILITY_RESERVE_ID) ORDER BY FACILITY_RESERVE_DT ASC , START_TIME ASC
SELECT FACILITY_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS FACILITY_RESERVE_ID FROM DUAL

select ANIMAL_PK AS animalId , ANIMAL_NM AS animalNm , ANIMAL_BDATE AS animalBdate , A.MASTER_PK as masterPk , MASTER_NM FROM ANIMAL_TEST A INNER JOIN MASTER_TEST M ON 1=1 AND A.MASTER_PK = M.MASTER_PK WHERE ANIMAL_NM LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by ANIMAL_BDATE desc
